participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Shy and introverted, often gets overwhelmed in social situations but has a vivid imagination.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves to explore new things and has a deep passion for animals.
participant_2.background: i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. my father was a door to door salesman. i also have a dog walking business.

content.text: good finished my shift and needed to put my feet up for a bit .
Hey, are you here? What's up?
i agree what do yo do for work ?
